page.title: 07SHOPPING IN HOLYMOORSIDE 2
page.content: {(2) WHAT GOODS DO YOU BUY IN {HOLYMOORSIDE?} The survey showed that shopping for {food} was most common in Holymoorside. Goods that are needed{everyday}were most bought.{76%}of the people asked bought{bread}in the village.{78%} relied on Holymoorside for{vegetables and{72%}for{meat.}The number of people buying{household goods}was only{41%.} This is probably because household goods are likely to be cheaper in the larger supermarkets of Chesterfield. {26%}of those asked relied on the { {sub-post office}in Holymoorside. These were mainly{pensioners}collecting their weekly {pensions.}Another interesting feature was the{70%}who relied on one shop for their daily{ {newspapers.}This is probably because it is too far to travel into Chesterfield everyday.
